channel.title: Northeastern’s first Churchill Scholar will Study Breast Cancer - News @ Northeastern

image.title: Northeastern’s first Churchill Scholar will Study Breast Cancer - News @ Northeastern

item.title: Northeastern’s first Churchill Scholar will study breast cancer at Cambridge University
item.description:
Cameron Young, who will graduate from Northeastern in May, recently earned the Churchill Scholarship, an award granted to outstanding American students to attend Cambridge University in England.. Photo by Ruby Wallau/Northeastern University
